alert.note: Alert for Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 2:34PM EST until January 15 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 15 inches, with up to 18 inches possible in the most persistent lake effect bands. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southwestern St. Lawrence County. * WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. The lake effect snow event may persist for an extended duration.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
